---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an improvement to an existing tool
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Tool Name

Which tool should be improved? (e.g., `structured-error-handler`)

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like. Be specific about the interface (CLI flags, API methods, etc.)

## Example Usage

Show how this feature would be used:

```bash
# CLI example
tool-name --new-flag value
```

```typescript
// API example
const result = process(input, { newOption: true });
```

## Alternatives Considered

What alternatives have you considered? Why are they not suitable?

## Compatibility

Would this change break existing behavior? If so, how can we mitigate that?

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or references here.
